channel.title: davewiner tweets
channel.description: A feed of recent tweets from davewiner.

item.description: @Scobleizer you must know someone.
BTW, I am now rated a 95 driver by my Tesla. https://t.co/DPA5z1XLxv
Bay Area Doctor Plans to Offer Abortions Via Boat Off the Gulf of Mexico. https://t.co/GBFU4PDhUQ
@brettglass Brett I love that you remember LBBS. ðŸ¤ª

Open standards are precious when they come about and should be protected. We've been around this many times, Microsoft would have done much better if they had let the web grow around them without trying to own it. The same will be learned by spotify re podcasting.
Elon Musk and Twitter lawyer up ahead of a legal battle in Delaware. https://t.co/gaqfZVQ0MW
Also we should all be thinking about a possible post-Twitter world.

I wish the Atlantic, Nation, New Yorker, New York etc would unbundle, and do their own substacks. i want everything unbundled and to buy a la carte. I pay good money for writing, itâ€™s just that most of it is wasted on writing that doesnâ€™t matter to me.
Ulster County Board of Elections: I Voted Sticker Contest. https://t.co/emMgkkgZid
A graphic showing Stack Exchange infrastructure. https://t.co/4pnEyZUAbr
Webb Telescope Will Look for Signs of Life Way Out There. #nopaywall https://t.co/a7Q2NCzOrO
Talking Heads: Once in a Lifetime. https://t.co/xBjiQ9kfBf
@bloatedlesbian it makes no sense at all.
@danmactough @nytimes i just read the book Caste, and it explains this so well. we all have parts to play and it's always hard to break out of the roles we're expected to play.
@podfeet yeah that song was a warning that you really don't want to eat comet. never thought about it that way.

@mignano i took down my replies -- i don't know you, and there's nothing i can do about spotify, but i'm still gratified that despite their greed and others, podcasting is going great as an open protocol. i prefer to focus on that and keep building.
Ken Smith: If our culture was healthier. https://t.co/KY3zUkSg8R

comet it makes your mouth turn green comet it tastes like gasoline comet will make you vomit so buy some comet and vomit today
this is a real song, we used to sing it when i was a kid.
https://t.co/GmbJ8lA9kw
abraham lincoln was a mighty fine man washed his face in a frying pan jumped out the window with his (redacted) in his hand and said pardon me ma'am i'm superman

@mignano wow you're the head of podcasts at spotify. oy. you guys are the worst. stop calling your things podcasts. and step back into the shadows. you are not working with anyone in podcasts, you are the enemy of podcasts. wow this chutzpah is breath-taking.
@marshallk i moved here in march 2019 from midtown manhattan. i've always wanted to live in the catskills. it's an incredible place.
@marshallk I live in a place like that in the mountains north of NYC.

the problem in tech is there is very little effective communication, esp ironic given all the bits that go over the wire.
i'm spending this year re-learning what i know about RSS and feed tech. the more i view the landscape the more i see a tragedy that no one listened to each other, no one worked together.
working together is failure of humanity, i know that sounds grandiose, but it's also true.
maybe as twitter closes the book on the musk interlude is we and they will settle in for a long haul. let's all work together to try to create a world-scale communication system which in addition to all its flaws, fosters great communication betw people of good will and ability.

@dsearls actually that's not true. i just saw a thing (i'll look for it) that explained what StackExchange's server setup looks like. this is a very highly used site among developers, immersive as you say -- and it runs on a handful of machines.
@dsearls the technology has moved forward making some old ideas obsolete.
@chasporter I only lived in cowtown for three years but it's in my blood.
On Tuesday at 10:30AM Eastern, the big reveal of the first photos from the James Webb Space Telescope. https://t.co/QcqtHZ0bqr
